mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS (name, login_id, password, tel, email, birth, nick_name, gender) VALUES (#{name}, #{loginId}, #{password}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{nickName}, #{gender})
mapper.select: SELECT member_id, login_id, password FROM MEMBERS WHERE login_id = #{loginId} AND password = #{password} AND status != 'DELETED'
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERS SET status = 'DELETED', updated_at = NOW() WHERE login_id = #{loginId} AND status != 'DELETED'
